Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: co-star \co-star\ v. t. to feature as the co-star in a performance; as, the film co-starred Robin Williams as the psychiatrist. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: co-star \co-star\ v. i. to be the co-star in a performance; as, Robin Williams co-starred in the film. [WordNet 1.5]
co-star n : one of two actors who are given equal status as stars in a play or film v 1: feature as the co-star in a performance 2: be the co-star in a performance [also: {co-starring}, {co-starred}]
